00065   void processOptions(UserServer userServer, const UMS_Data::ListCmdOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest)
00066   {
00067     boost::posix_time::ptime pt;
00068     size_t userIdSize = options->getUserId().size();
00069     bool listAll = options->isAdminListOption();
00070 
00071     if ((!userServer.isAdmin()) && (userIdSize!=0 || listAll)) {
00072        UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_NO_ADMIN);
00073        throw e;
00074     }
00075 
00076     if(userIdSize!=0) {
00077        //To check if the user id is correct
00078       checkUserId(options->getUserId());
00079 
00080       addOptionRequest("userid", options->getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00081     } else {
00082             if(!listAll) {
00083                addOptionRequest("userid", userServer.getData().getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00084             }
00085     }
00086 
00087     if(options->getSessionId().size()!=0) {
00088       //To check if the session id is correct
00089       checkSessionId(options->getSessionId());
00090 
00091       addOptionRequest("vsessionid", options->getSessionId(), sqlRequest);
00092     }
00093 
00094     time_t startDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getStartDateOption());
00095     if(startDate!=-1) {
00096       pt =  boost::posix_time::from_time_t(startDate);
00097       std::string startDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(pt);
00098       addTimeRequest("starttime", startDateStr, sqlRequest, ">=");
00099     }
00100 
00101     time_t endDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getEndDateOption());
00102     if(endDate!=-1) {
00103       pt =  boost::posix_time::from_time_t(endDate);
00104       std::string endDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(pt);
00105       addTimeRequest("endtime", endDateStr, sqlRequest, "<=");
00106     }
00107   }

00115   UMS_Data::ListCommands* list()
00116   {
00117     std::string sqlListOfCommands;
00118     std::vector<std::string>::iterator ii;
00119     std::vector<std::string> results;
00120     std::string description;
00121 
00122     sqlListOfCommands = "SELECT ctype, vsessionid, name, description, starttime, endtime, command.status from "
00123                          " vsession, clmachine, command, users where vsession.numsessionid=command.vsession_numsessionid and "
00124                          " vsession.clmachine_numclmachineid=clmachine.numclmachineid and  vsession.users_numuserid=users.numuserid";
00125 
00126 
00127     UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00128     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListCommands();
00129 
00130     //Creation of the object user
00131     UserServer userServer = UserServer(msessionServer);
00132     userServer.init();
00133     //if the user exists
00134     if (userServer.exist()) {
00135 
00136       processOptions(userServer, mparameters, sqlListOfCommands);
00137 
00138       sqlListOfCommands.append(" order by starttime");
00139       //To get the list of commands from the database
00140       boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> ListOfCommands (mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListOfCommands.c_str()));
00141       if (ListOfCommands->getNbTuples() != 0){
00142         for (size_t i = 0; i < ListOfCommands->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00143           results.clear();
00144           results = ListOfCommands->get(i);
00145           ii = results.begin();
00146 
00147           UMS_Data::Command_ptr command = ecoreFactory->createCommand();
00148           CmdType currentCmdType = static_cast<CmdType>(convertToInt(*ii));
00149           command->setCommandId(convertCmdType(static_cast<CmdType>(currentCmdType)));
00150           command->setSessionId(*(++ii));
00151           command->setMachineId(*(++ii));
00152           //MAPPER CREATION
00153           Mapper* mapper = MapperRegistry::getInstance()->getMapper(convertypetoMapperName(currentCmdType));
00154           description = mapper->decode(*(++ii));
00155           command->setCmdDescription(description);
00156           command->setCmdStartTime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00157           command->setCmdEndTime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00158           command->setStatus(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00159 
00160           mlistObject->getCommands().push_back(command);
00161         }
00162     }
00163 
00164   }
00165   else {
00166       UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_USER);
00167       throw e;
00168   }
00169   return mlistObject;
00170   }

00188   std::string convertCmdType(CmdType type) {
00189 
00190     std::string cmd;
00191     switch(type) {
00192       case UMS :
00193          cmd = "UMS";
00194          break;
00195       case TMS :
00196          cmd = "TMS";
00197          break;
00198       case FMS :
00199          cmd = "FMS";
00200          break;
00201       case IMS :
00202          cmd = "IMS";
00203          break;
00204     }
00205     return cmd;
00206   }

00214   std::string
00215   convertypetoMapperName(CmdType type) {
00216 
00217     std::string mapperName;
00218     switch(type) {
00219       case UMS :
00220          mapperName = UMSMAPPERNAME;
00221          break;
00222       case TMS :
00223          mapperName = TMSMAPPERNAME;
00224          break;
00225       case FMS :
00226          mapperName = FMSMAPPERNAME;
00227          break;
00228       case IMS :
00229          mapperName = IMSMAPPERNAME;
00230          break;
00231     }
00232     return mapperName;
00233   }
